about_the_game:
Up Down All-a-Round is a fast paced online pvp first person shooter, where you control your player's gravity up and down and all a round! Master your gravity manipulating abilites to outwit your opponents and win the game!



At the moment Up Down All-a-Round features 4 game modes, Forever Free For All, Free For All, 4v4s and 2v2s with one more gamemode being worked on! Oh there is also a training room to practice your gravity manipulating abilites!


*Please note customization options shown in this gif are not available in the base game*

HOW TO PLAY


Speaking of gravity manipulating abilites how do you use them? Great question, Up Down All-a-Round's controls are relaltivly simple but are hard to master. You use WASD to move around and the mouse to look around, R to reload and space to jump but they are other controls to take into a count! You control your gravity left and right with the shift left and right buttons which are set to Q and E by default, and control your gravity going up and down with the shift up/down button which is set to the left shift button by default. If you are shifting your gravity left or right and find yourself stuck to a wall, you need to press the stop button which is defaulted to tab. To stop shifting your gravity left or right.

Master the gravity manipulating abilites and you will have a great time!

name: Up Down All-a-Round

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel I5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DircetX 11 Sound Card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel I5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 700
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DircetX 11 Sound Card

short_description: Control your player's gravity up and down and all a round! Master your gravity manipulating abilites to outwit your opponents and win the game!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support
